title: Dr. Langeskov, The Tiger, and The Terribly Cursed Emerald: A Whirlwind Heist
notes: Alt-Tab messes up mouse input (mouse either "gets stuck" at the edge of the screen preventing turning any further or can leave the game window to another monitor) / pausing + unpausing game fixes mouse issues
Seems fine, aside from not detecting my 360 controller.
title: Dr. Langeskov, The Tiger, and The Terribly Cursed Emerald: A Whirlwind Heist

notes: The game works perfectly aside from one thing that kills all the enjoyment - every time you make *any* camera movement, it drifts 1 pixel to the right and 1 pixel down. So if you move the camera down, you're really moving it right-down, and even if you move the camera up, just *really* slowly (<1px per frame), it will still drift to bottom of the screen.
title: Dr. Langeskov, The Tiger, and The Terribly Cursed Emerald: A Whirlwind Heist
